segments.text: Have you got your invitation yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My invitation ? No , I haven't . My invitation to what ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Whose house warming party is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tom and Bill Smith . They are both working now you know ? And they've bought a new house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , they have ? I didn't know . I haven't seen Tom lately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have . I went out with them last weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . There are three bedrooms , a living room , a dining room , and a big kitchen . There's also a garden .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , that does sound nice . Have they moved in yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are moving today . Tom's taken the day off . He's rented a truck , and they should have all their furniture in the house tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When are they going to have the party ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next Saturday night . You should get your invitation today or tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , that would be something to look forward to .
segments.speaker: S2
